@RebeccaSchorr @ChelseaRaeMoses Yes, you are completely right! I'm also happy that I finished the Duolingo course and now know all about camels, elephants, penguins, giraffes and pandas. It was just time for something else :-)

@ChelseaRaeMoses Using the same textbook and being in the same class, I'm actually happy to learn some of these more old-fashioned words after all the tselkes and komputers from Duolingo. I find that words like drukerai, shuster & stolier make it easier to read Yiddish texts by famous authors.
